name: Scared (Lamp1, strausste)
description:
A short and simple horror game.

You play as a kid, who's having a nightmare.

Keys:

-WASD to move

-Mouse to move the camera

- E to open doors and interact

 This game was made in 4 days (we started late) by two people  for Brackeys gamejam 2022.1.

Credits:

-https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ zombie and door sfxs

-Unity asset store, walk sfxs

-https://freepbr.com materials
